CmdLine: set -e       && apt-get -y update       && apt-get -y dist-upgrade       && apt-get -y install --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests         ca-certificates curl g++ gcc libbz2-dev liblzma-dev libz-dev make         python3.8       && apt-get -y autoremove       && apt-get clean       && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CmdLine: set -eo pipefail       && ln -s /usr/bin/python3.8 /usr/bin/python       && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/print-github-tags       && print-github-tags --release --latest --tar arq5x/bedtools2         | xargs -i curl -SL {} -o /tmp/bedtools2.tar.gz       && tar xvf /tmp/bedtools2.tar.gz -C /usr/local/src --remove-files       && mv /usr/local/src/bedtools2-* /usr/local/src/bedtools2       && cd /usr/local/src/bedtools2       && make       && make install
